target: These anaerobic beings seem friendly enough.
Drains oxygen from rooms
Takes no damage from lack of oxygen
Morph
The Morphs are a genetic experiment from the Shells gone wrong. They have the unique ability to mimic other carbon crew and their capabilities.
45 Health, immune to suffocation
At empty beacons can be made to mimic most genetic crew types. All mimicked crew will have 25% less health than normal and suffocation immunity.
Malform
A reverse engineered monstrosity produced by the members of a secret Rebel organization. Do not underestimate these blobish creatures because of their size.
60 Health, immune to suffocation
At empty beacons can be made to mimic most elite crew types. All mimicked crew will have 25% less health than normal and suffocation immunity. Cannot change its form after morphing.
Technopath
The Technopaths carry a special mutation of the Morph genes that allow them to conduct electricity, and therefore imitate certain electronics or metaloid beings.
55 Health, immune to suffocation
At empty beacons can be made to mimic most electronic or Drone crew types. All mimicked crew will have 15% less health than normal and suffocation immunity.
